a-jig-so-puzzled.name: A Jig So Puzzled
a-jig-so-puzzled.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
a-jig-so-puzzled.content:
\relative f' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \key d \major
    \time 6/8

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 8 a8 |
      fis4 d8 fis4 a8 |
      d8 cis b a4 a8 |
      b8 g b a g fis |
      e4. a4
      \bar "|" \break

      a8 |
      fis4 d8 fis4 a8 |
      d8 cis b a4 a8 |
      b8 g b a g fis |
      e4. d4
    } \break

    e8 |
    fis4 d8 fis4 fis8 |
    g8 fis e fis4 fis8 |
    g8 fis e fis e d |
    cis a cis e4
    \bar "|" \break

    e8 |
    fis4 d8 fis4 fis8 |
    g8 fis e fis4 fis8 |
    g8 fis e fis e d |
    cis4. b4
    \bar "||" \break

    e8 |
    fis4 d8 fis4 fis8 |
    g8 fis e fis4 fis8 |
    g8 fis e fis e d |
    cis a cis e4
    \bar "|" \break

    e8 |
    fis4 d8 fis4 a8 |
    d8 cis b a4 a8 |
    b8 g b a g fis |
    e4. d4
    \bar "|."
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s8 |
      d4. d/cis | b:m a | g d/fis | e:7 a:7 |
      d4. d/cis | b:m a | g d/fis | a:7 d |

      b2.:m | e4.:m b:m | e:m b:m | a a:7 |
      b2.:m | e4.:m b:m | e:m b:m | a:7 b:m |

      b2.:m | e4.:m b:m | e:m b:m | a a:7 |
      d4. d/cis | b:m a | g d/fis | a:7 d4
    }
  }
>>

donaldson-s-rant.name: Donaldson's Rant
donaldson-s-rant.author: Saskia Frisby
donaldson-s-rant.content:
<<
  \relative c'' {
    \clef treble
    \key c \major
    \time 6/8

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 8 g8 |
      c,4 e8 g4 c,8 |
      f g a g4 c8 |
      g e c a' g f |
      e d c d4. |
      \break

      e4 a8 g4 c8 |
      e d c b4. |
      c8 b a g a g |
      f e d c4
    } \break

    \repeat volta 2 {
      a'8 |
      g b d e c a |
      g b d g e c |
      f d b e c a |
      b c a g4 g8 |
      \break

      c,4 g'8 f4 a8 |
      g4 b8 c4 e8 |
      c a d b g c |
      c d b c4.
    } \break

    g8 a b c4. |
    f,8 e d c4. |
    c'8 b e g,4. |
    f8 e g d4 g8 |
    \break

    c,4 e8 g4 c,8 |
    f g a g4 e'8 |
    g,4 c8 e,4 g8 |
    f e d c4
    \bar "|."
  }

  \chords {
    s8 |
    c2. | f4. c | c f | c g |
    a4.:m c | c g | c g | g c4

    s8 |
    g4. c | g c | b:dim c | g g |
    c4. f | g c | f g | c4 g8 c4. |

    g4. c | f c | c g | f g |
    c2. | f4. c | g c | g c4
  }
>>

en-marchant-pour-aller-photocopier-des-t.name: En marchant pour aller photocopier des trucs
en-marchant-pour-aller-photocopier-des-t.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
en-marchant-pour-aller-photocopier-des-t.composer-details:
I wrote this tune during Summer School 2019. It was an assignment given by Ian
Muir as part of the course for class musicians. The week was very busy and the
only time I found to compose the tune while I was on my way to the centre of
St. Andrews to go print music sets.
en-marchant-pour-aller-photocopier-des-t.content:
\transpose a, d {
  \relative g' <<
    {
      \clef treble
      \key a \major
      \time 6/8

      \repeat volta 2 {
        \partial 8 b8 |
        cis8 a a a a gis |
        fis d d d d cis |
        b d fis gis fis e |
        e fis gis a b cis |
        \break

        cis a a a a gis |
        fis d d d d cis |
        b d fis e gis b |
        a4. a4
      } \break

      gis8 |
      fis cis cis cis b cis |
      fis d d d cis d |
      e b b b a b |
      cis d e fis gis a |
      \break

      fis cis cis cis b cis |
      fis d d d cis d |
      e b b b a gis |
      fis4. fis4 fis8 |
      \bar "||" \break

      fis' cis cis cis b cis |
      fis d d d cis d |
      e b b b a b |
      cis d e fis4 d'8 |
      \break

      cis a a a a gis fis d d d d cis |
      b d fis e gis b |
      a4. a4
      \bar "|."
    }

    \new ChordNames {
      \chordmode {
        s8 |
        a2. | d | b:m | e:7 |
        a2. | d | b4.:m e:7 | a2. |

        fis2.:m/cis | d | e | cis4.:m fis:m |
        fis2.:m/cis | d | e | fis:m |

        fis2.:m/cis | d | e | cis4.:m d/fis |
        a2. | d | b4.:m e:7 | a4. s4
      }
    }
  >>
}

forty-bars-of-clouds.name: Forty Bars of Clouds
forty-bars-of-clouds.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
forty-bars-of-clouds.content:
\relative f' <<
  {
    \clef treble
    \key c \major
    \time 4/4

    c'4 c8 d e g,4 g8 |
    c b c d e d c b |
    d4 d8 e f a,4 a8 |
    d cis d e f e d c |
    \break

    c4 c8 d e g,4 g8 |
    c b c d e d c b |
    f'4 d8 f e4 c8 e |
    d4 b8 d c4 c |
    \bar "||" \break

    c8 b c d e g,4 g8 |
    c b c d e d c b |
    d cis d e f a,4 a8 |
    d cis d e f e d c |
    \break

    c b c d e g,4 g8 |
    c b c d e d c b |
    f'8 d a f' e c g e' |
    d b g d' c4 c |
    \bar "||" \break

    a'8 gis a b c e,4 e8 |
    a gis a b c b a g |
    g fis g a b d,4 d8 |
    g fis g a b a g f |
    \break

    f e f g a c,4 c8 |
    f e f g a g f e |
    gis e gis a b e,4 e8 |
    gis e gis a b a gis e |
    \bar "||" \break

    a8 gis a b c e,4 e8 |
    a gis a b c b a g |
    g fis g a b d,4 d8 |
    g fis g a b a g f |
    \break

    f e f g a c,4 c8 |
    f e f g a g f e |
    \tuplet 3/4 { b4 c8 } \tuplet 3/4 { d4 c8 } |
    \tuplet 3/4 { b4 c8 } b2 |
    \bar "||" \break

    c4 c8 d e g,4 g8 |
    c b c d e d c b |
    d cis d e f a,4 a8 |
    d cis d e f e d c |
    \break

    c b c d e g,4 g8 |
    c b c d e d c b |
    f' d a f' e c g e' |
    d b g d' c4 c |
    \bar "|."
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      c1 | s | d:m | s | c | s | d2:m c | g c |
      c1 | s | d:m | s | c | s | d2:m c | g c |
      a1:m | s | g | s | f | s | e | s |
      a1:m | s | g | s | f | s | e | s |
      c1 | s | d:m | s | c | s | d2:m c | g c |
    }
  }
>>

la-ville-lumiere.name: La Ville Lumière
la-ville-lumiere.author: Pascaline Latour

love-is-in-the-air-48-bars.name: Love is in the Air
love-is-in-the-air-48-bars.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
love-is-in-the-air-48-bars.content:
\relative f' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \time 4/4
    \key d \major

    \repeat volta 3 {
      \partial 4 a4 |
      d,4 fis8 a b4 a |
      b8 a b cis d4 d8 cis |
      b4 d8 fis b a g fis |
      e d cis b a g fis e |
      \break

      d4 fis8 a b4 a |
      b8 a b cis d4 d8 cis |
      b4 d8 fis b a g fis |
      e d e fis d4
      \bar "||" \break

      d8 e |
      fis4 a8 fis g fis e g |
      fis d b cis d cis b a |
      g a b cis d cis b a |
      a b cis d e fis g a |
      \break

      fis4 a8 fis g fis e g |
      fis d b cis d cis b a |
      g a b cis a b cis e |
      fis4 d d
    }
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s4 |
      d2 g | a d | b:m e:m | a2 a:7 |
      d2 g | a d | b:m e:m | a2:7 d4

      s4 |
      d2 e:m | b1:m | g | a2 a:7 |
      d2 e:m | b1:m | g2 a:7 | d2.
    }
  }
>>

out-of-tune.name: Out of Tune
out-of-tune.author: Aymeric Fromherz
out-of-tune.content:
\relative g'' <<
  {
    \clef treble
    \key g \minor
    \time 4/4

    \partial 4 fis4 |
    \repeat volta 2 {
      g2 d16 g8. bes,8. g'16 |
      c,8. bes16 a16 g8. fis8. a16 c16 ees8. |
      ees16 c8. c ees16 d bes8. bes d16 |
      c16 a8. a c16 bes8. a16 g fis'8. |
      \break

      g2 d16 g8. bes,8. g'16 |
      c,8. bes16 a16 g8. fis8. a16 c16 ees8. |
      d16 bes8. bes d16 c a8. a c16 |
      d8. c16 bes8. a16 g4 g4 |
      \bar "||" \break

      d16 g8. bes, g'16 d8. g16 a8 bes |
      c8. bes16 a g8. fis16 a8. d4 |
      c8. g16 ees c'8. bes8. g16 d8. bes'16 |
      a16 ees'8. d8. bes16 g4 bes4 |
      \break

      d,16 g8. bes, g'16 d8. g16 a8 bes |
      c8. bes16 a g8. fis16 a8. d4 |
      c8. g16 ees c'8. bes8. g16 d8. d'16 |
    } \alternative { {
      c8. bes16 a bes8. g4 fis'4
    } {
      c8. bes16 a bes8. g4 g4
    } } \bar "|."
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s4 |
      g1:m | c2:m d | c:m bes | a:m g:m |
      g1:m | c2:m d | bes a:m | d g:m |
      g1:m | c2:m d | c:m g:m | c4:m d g2:m |
      g1:m | c2:m d | c:m g:m | c4:m d g:m g:m7 | c4:m d g:m
    }
  }
>>

phd-thesis-what-a-bliss.name: PhD Thesis, What a Bliss!
phd-thesis-what-a-bliss.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
phd-thesis-what-a-bliss.content:
\relative f' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \time 4/4
    \key g \major

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 4 \tuplet 3/2 {d'8 e fis} |
      g4 g8 fis e4 e |
      d8 e d c b g g4 |
      g'4 g8 fis e fis g4 |
      a4. fis16 e d4 \tuplet 3/2 {d8 e fis} |
      \break

      g4 g8 fis e4 e |
      d8 e d c b g g4 |
      g8 fis g e' d c b a |
      b4 g g
    } \break

    \repeat volta 2 {
      g4 |
      a4 \tuplet 3/2 { a8 b c } d8 c b a |
      g8 b a g e4 e |
      a4 \tuplet 3/2 { a8 b c } d8 c d e |
      g4. fis16 e d4 d |
      \break

      a4 \tuplet 3/2 { a8 b c } d8 c b a |
      g8 b a g e4 d8 e |
      g8 fis g e' d c b a |
      b4 g g
    }
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s4 |
      g2 c | d:7 g | g c | a:7 d4 d:7 |
      g2 c | d:7 g | g d:7 | g2.

      s4 |
      a2:m d:7 | g e:m7 | a:m d:7 | a:7 d4 d:7 |
      a2:m d:7 | g e:m7 | g d:7 | g2.
    }
  }
>>

solstice-jig.name: Solstice Jig
solstice-jig.author: Mikael Georgii

the-fighter-of-bears.name: The Fighter of Bears
the-fighter-of-bears.author: Saskia Frisby
the-fighter-of-bears.content:
<<
  \relative c'' {
    \clef treble
    \key b \minor
    \time 4/4

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \repeat volta 2 {
        \partial 8 g'8 |
        fis8 b, b4 d8 b fis' b, |
        d8 b fis' b, a cis e g |
        fis8 b, b4 d8 b fis' b, |
        a8 b cis d cis d e g |
      } \break

      fis8 d b fis b fis d' fis, |
      e'8 a, cis a e' a, g' a, |
      fis'8 d b a fis g a b |
      a8 b cis d cis d e g |
      \break

      fis8 d b fis b fis d' fis, |
      e'8 a, cis a e' a, g' a, |
      fis'8 b, b4 d8 b fis' b, |
    } \alternative { {
      a8 b cis d cis d e g |
    } {
      g8 e cis fis, b4.
    } } \bar "|."
  }

  \chords {
    s8 |
    b1:m | b2:m a:7 | b1:m | a2 a:7 |

    b1:m | a2 a:7 | b1:m | a2 a:7 |
    b1:m | a2 a:7 | b1:m | a2 a:7 | a2:7 b4.:m
  }
>>

the-mall-in-st-james-s-park.name: The Mall in St. James's Park
the-mall-in-st-james-s-park.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
the-mall-in-st-james-s-park.content:
\relative f' <<
  {
    \clef treble
    \key d \major
    \time 4/4

    \repeat volta 2 {
      a16 a8. a'8 a, fis'16 d8. d4 |
      cis8. cis16 cis8 d cis4 cis |
      b8. b16 b8 cis d e fis g |
      a,8. a16 a8 b a4 a |
      \break

      a16 a8. a'8 a, fis'16 d8. d4 |
      cis8. cis16 cis8 d cis4 cis |
      \tuplet 3/2 { b4 d g } \tuplet 3/2 { a,4 cis e } |
      d2 d4 d |
      \bar "||" \break

      fis,16 fis8. fis'8 fis, ais cis fis fis, |
      fis16 fis8. fis'8 fis, b d fis fis, |
      e'16 e8. g8 e \tuplet 3/2 { e b g } e d |
      cis d e fis g a b cis |
      \break

      fis,16 fis8. fis'8 fis, ais cis fis fis, |
      fis16 fis8. fis'8 fis, b d fis fis, |
      e'16 e8. g8 e \tuplet 3/2 { e b g } e d |
      cis8. a16 b8 cis d4 d |
    }
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      d1 | fis:m/cis | g | a |
      d1 | fis:m/cis | g2 a | d1 |

      fis1 | b:m | e:m | a |
      fis1 | b:m | e:m | a2 d |
    }
  }
>>

the-sober-piper.name: The Sober Piper
the-sober-piper.author: Anne Lanvin
the-sober-piper.content:
\relative a <<
  {
    \clef treble
    \key a' \major
    \time 4/4

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 4 e''4 |
      a,4 a8 cis e4 e8 fis |
      e8 fis a fis fis4 d |
      d, d8 fis a4 a8 b |
      a cis e cis d4 fis |
      \break

      a, a8 cis e4 e8 fis
      e8 fis a fis e4 cis |
      d e8 fis e fis e d |
      cis4 a a
    } \break

    e' |
    a4. cis,8 e4 a, |
    d8 cis b cis a4 cis4 |
    d,4 d8 fis a4 b |
    a8 cis e cis d4 fis |
    \break

    a4. cis,8 e4 a, |
    d8 cis b cis a4 cis4 |
    d e8 fis e fis e d |
    cis4 a a  e' |
    \bar "||" \break

    a4. cis,8 e4 a, |
    d8 cis b cis a4 cis4 |
    d,4 d8 fis a4 b |
    a8 cis e cis d4 fis |
    \break

    a,4 a8 cis e4 e8 fis |
    e fis a fis e4 cis |
    d e8 fis e fis e d |
    cis4 a a
    \bar "|."
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s4 |
      a1 | a | d | d | a | a | d | a |

      a1 | a | d | d | a | a | d | a |
      a1 | a | d | d | fis:m | fis:m | b:m | a2.
    }
  }
>>

the-translator.name: The Translator
the-translator.author: Nicolas “Niols” Jeannerod
